name: bypass-tool-pro-monorepo
description: Bypass Tool Pro - SEO Ranking Tool with Firebase + Supabase

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.deploy:frontend: pnpm --filter frontend build && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:backend: cd packages/backend/firebase-functions && npm install && npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm deploy:backend && pnpm deploy:frontend
scripts.setup:supabase: echo 'Setup Supabase database and update DATABASE_URL in config files'
scripts.setup:firebase: echo 'Setup Firebase project and update firebase.json'
